text:
This is the image sketch for the costume?
It's cute...!

Ribbons, frills, lace trim...
The sweet pink is also lovely...

Hmm? Is there something on your mind?
Feel free to tell me.

Since it's such a cute outfit...
I'm a little worried if I can pull it off...

You'll be fine, Chiyuki.
I'm looking forward to seeing all three of you in this outfit.

Hehe, I love this kind of atmosphere.
That's why...

I'll do my best to become an idol who looks good in this
outfit. Chiyuki Kuwayama, I'll do my best!
